example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (PRT (VERB_PART قد)) (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS ابرق) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN_PROP الانتربول) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_NOM المحلي)) (PP (PREP الى) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN نظير) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه))) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN اليوناني)))) (PP-PRP (PREP ل) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN معرفة) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ اذا) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS كانت) (PP-PRD (PREP ل) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN قبطان) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الباخرة)))) (NP-SBJ (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM سوابق)) (PP (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN مجال) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_GEN تهريب) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN اجانب)) (NP-MNR (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC بحراً)))))))))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: If the captain of the ship had previous involvement in the smuggling of foreigners by sea

example.arg: اذا كانت لقبطان الباخرة سوابق في مجال تهريب اجانب بحراً
